title: FSIS Issues Public Health Alert for Frozen Pork and Beef Tortellini Product Due to Misbranding and Undeclared Allergens
summary: WASHINGTON, July 30, 2025 - The U.S. Department of Agriculture's Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) is issuing a public health alert for frozen product labeled as pork and beef tortellini due to misbranding and undeclared allergens. The frozen product labeled as pork and beef...

establishment.name: P.E. & F Inc. DBA DiMare's Specialty Foods

impacted_products: 16-oz. bag "Schnucks Tortellini PORK & BEEF" with best by date of 05/27/2026 printed at the top of the bag.
